search.query: index=it_risk | stats values(risk_object) AS risk_object | mvexpand risk_object

html.p: At various points you may want to manually adjust a users risk score, this form allows you to submit amendments, these will then be stored and instantly applied to a user, this could be that you reduce the risk score because of a false positive, or increase it because of a request.
It records the user that presses submit with the amendment for audit purposes.

search.query: | stats count | eval risk_object="$risk_object$",risk_score="$risk_score$",reason="$reason$",_time=now(),modification_user="$env:user$" | fields - count| collect index=it_risk source="Manual Risk Score Modification"
